inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: s/p allogeneic transplant with recurrent disease and systemic amyloidosis

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Quantifiable serum M-protein value (>1 g/dL of immunoglobulin (Ig)G or IgM M-protein)

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Voluntary written informed consent must be given before performance of any study related procedure

exclusion.criterion: Smoldering Multiple Myeloma or Monoclonal Gammopathy of Undetermined Significance (MGUS)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Waldenström's Disease or Other Conditions with IgM M-protein
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior Systemic Therapy for Multiple Myeloma
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: Patient was Initially treated with melphalan and prednisone, followed by VAD regimen, and autologous stem cell transplant

exclusion.criterion: Radiation Therapy within 2 weeks before randomization
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Major Surgery within 30 days before randomization
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of Allergy to Study Medications or Excipients
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: ≥Grade 2 Peripheral Neuropathy on Clinical Examination within 21 days before enrollment
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Clinical Laboratory Values within 21 days prior to enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with systemic amyloidosis and is on hemodialysis for ESRD. She was treated with various therapies, including melphalan and prednisone, VAD regimen, and autologous stem cell transplant.
